title: Homework#1
body: I attached some files which might be helpful in order to solve the test uploaded on the course's site. Results will be posted within a week from deadline

title: Final project
body: Don't forget to send your final projects by tomorrow or they won't be considered...

title: Hello World
body: Write a hello world program, please send it as a zip file. First 3 tot turn in will get a bonus.

title: Test
body: This is for those who need to increase their grade. Write a program reading and writing files using Buffered Reader.
